/
MEMORANDUM
WN 18 ^ *Â»
November 15, 195?
To: Prank Schooley
UNIVERSE
cc: Jack McBride
Harry Skornia
From: Burton Paulu
In regard to the Eisenhower message: I am the guilty
party!
I read it to the Board and again at the Tuesday evening
opening session,
I thought I'd brought it back home with me. We are
turning both the Paulu household and the KUOM office upside
down. Of all things I would not want to lose, a telegram
addressed to me from the President of the United States
(despite its obviously impersonal nature) would be number
one. Yet, it seems to have disappeared. Maybe a souvenir
hunter in St. Louis pinched it! Well, anyway, if it's here,
it will soon be found, and airmailed to you.
Sorry for causing the delay.
BP:ds
